author: Special Correspondent
text:
The first level checking of Electronic Voting Machines to be used in the district for the Assembly elections commenced here on Wednesday.

A technical team of four engineers from the Bharat Electronics Limited would check the EVMs for their operational readiness. On Wednesday, the process of checking the 6,115 ballot and 3,500 control units, including those received from Bihar recently, began on the Collector’s Office campus in the presence of representatives of political parties.

Collector K.S. Palanisamy inspected the exercise, an official release said.
title: EVMs arrive in Tiruchi
